lines.text: This royal throne of Kings, this scepter'd isle, this precious stone set in a silver sea; this blessed plot, this earth, this realm, this England!
I wasted time, and now time doth waste me.
A trespass that doth vex my grieved soul.
Deep malice makes too deep incision.
Forget, forgive, conclude and be agreed.
Mine ear is open and my heart prepared.
My heart this covenant makes, my lips thus seals it.
